name: Mahou: The Wizard King
description:
Mahou, the wizard king, is a trading card game were the player can build his grimoire/deck with spells that go from casting special effects to summoning creatures. During battle the player will use the cards in his grimoire to defeat the enemy by reducing his life points to zero. The end goal to this game is to defeat the dark lord Havoc and claim his title of wizard king.

Gameplay

In this card game at the start of the game you and the computer receive 4 random cards each. Your cards are in the bottom of the screen.

Your Turn
In your turns, you'll first select a card to attack with by clicking the arrow beneath said card.
Next to attack you'll have to select one of the AI's card with the arrow on top of it.

AI's Turn

After your turn a button will appear in the middle of the screen to let the AI attack. The AI attacks one of your cards at random.

Cooldowns

Everytime you or the AI attacks with a card it will be on cooldown for 2 turns. While a card is no cooldown it can not be used again.

End Game Conditions

For the game to end either you or the AI have to lose all 4 cards.

Pass

If you do not wish to attack or can not do so because your cards are on cooldown, you can pass your turn.


Defense
When you or the AI lose one of your cards your defense points will go up by each card lost. The higher your defense value, the less damage your cards will take.

Controls

Mouse- Select cards

P- Pause the game
